title: New job start date
legend: When do you start your new job? (optional)
p1: Tell us about your new job. If you do not know the exact date then enter your best estimate.

newJobStartDate.dayRequired: Enter a day for when your New job starts. For example, 23
newJobStartDate.monthRequired: Enter a month for when your New job starts. For example, 08
newJobStartDate.yearRequired: Enter a year for when your New job starts. For example, 2022
newJobStartDate.invalidDateInPast: Date entered must not be in the past
newJobStartDate.invalidDateMoreThanTenYearsInFuture: Enter a date between now and 10 years in the future
newJobStartDate.dayNotANumber: Day must only contain numbers. For example, 23
newJobStartDate.monthNotANumber: Month must only contain numbers. For example, 04
newJobStartDate.yearNotANumber: Year must only contain numbers. For example, 2022
newJobStartDate.invalidDate: New job start date must be a real date.
